description.narrative:
The project will provide support for the advancement of the Scholars Program work with young people with disabilities through 1) the development of disability inclusion tools and resources for the Scholars Program 2) facilitation of training sessions and provision of technical support for the Scholars Program partners and 3) the facilitation of disability inclusion sessions for the 2020 Baobab Summit.
Core Activities - Develop a Disability Inclusion Guide for Scholars Program tertiary level partners (including an Accessibility Audit Tool) -Conduct an external mapping on Disability Inclusion best practices in Higher Education -Develop a Disability Reflection Toolkit for the Scholars Program -Provide technical support to Scholars Program Partners -Facilitate two virtual sessions on disability and resilience at the 2020 Baobab Summit - Facilitate the Scholars Program Inclusion Working Group in collaboration with other partners
